00036 using namespace std;
00037 
00038 class Topology;
00039 class Molecule;
00040 class Segment;
00041 class Fragment;
00042 
00049 class Atom 
00050 {
00051 public:   
00052 
00053     Atom(Molecule *owner,
00054          string residue_name,   int resnr,
00055          string md_atom_name,   int md_atom_id,
00056          bool hasQMPart,        int qm_atom_id,
00057          vec qmPos,             string element,
00058          double weight)
00059        : _mol(owner),            
00060          _resname(residue_name), _resnr(resnr),
00061          _name(md_atom_name),    _id(md_atom_id),
00062          _hasQM(hasQMPart),      _qmId(qm_atom_id),
00063          _weight(weight),        _bPos(false),
00064          _qmPos(qmPos),          _element(element)  { }
00065     
00066     Atom(int atom_id,   string atom_name)
00067        : _id(atom_id),  _name(atom_name),
00068          _hasQM(false), _qmId(-1) { }
00069 
00070     Atom(Atom *stencil)
00071        : _id(stencil->getId()),              _top(NULL),
00072          _element(stencil->getElement()),    _hasQM(stencil->HasQMPart()),
00073          _weight(stencil->getWeight()),      _qmId(stencil->getQMId()),
00074          _name(stencil->getName()+"_ghost"), _mol(NULL), 
00075          _qmPos(stencil->getQMPos()),        _pos(stencil->getPos()),
00076          _bPos(true),                        _resnr(stencil->getResnr()),
00077          _resname(stencil->getResname())       { }
00078 
00079     Atom() { };
00080    ~Atom() { _Q.clear(); }
00081 
00082     const int     &getId() const { return _id; }
00083     const string  &getName() const { return _name; }
00084     const string  &getType() const { return _type; }
00085     const int     &getResnr() const { return _resnr; }
00086 
00087     inline void setTopology(Topology *container) { _top = container; }
00088     inline void setMolecule(Molecule *container) { _mol = container; }
00089     inline void setSegment(Segment *container)   { _seg = container; }
00090     inline void setFragment(Fragment *container) { _frag = container; }
00091 
00092     Topology *getTopology() { return _top; }
00093     Molecule *getMolecule() { return _mol; }
00094     Segment  *getSegment() { return _seg; }
00095     Fragment *getFragment() { return _frag; }
00096 
00097     inline void setResnr(const int &resnr) { _resnr = resnr; }
00098     inline void setResname(const string &resname) { _resname = resname; }
00099     inline void setWeight(const double &weight) { _weight = weight; }
00100     inline void setQMPart(const int &qmid, vec qmPos);
00101     inline void setQMPos(const vec &qmPos) { _qmPos = qmPos; }
00102     inline void setElement(const string &element) { _element = element; }
00103     inline void TranslateBy(const vec &shift) { _pos = _pos + shift; }
00104     
00105     inline const int    &getResnr() { return _resnr; }
00106     inline const string &getResname() { return _resname; }
00107     inline const double &getWeight() { return _weight; }
00108     inline const int    &getQMId() { return _qmId; }
00109     inline const vec    &getQMPos() { return _qmPos; }
00110     inline const string &getElement() { return _element; }
00111 
00112     inline const double &getQ(int state) { return _Q.at(state); }
00113     inline const double &getQ() { return _q->second; }
00114     inline void          setQ( map<int, double> Q) { _Q = Q; }
00115     void                 chrg(int state) { _q = _Q.find(state); }
00116 
00117     inline void          setPTensor(matrix &ptensor) { _ptensor = ptensor; }
00118     const matrix        &getPTensor() { return _ptensor; }
00119 
00124     const vec &getPos() const;
00129     void setPos(const vec &r);
00134     vec &Pos() { return _pos; }
00136     bool HasPos() {return _bPos; }           
00138     void HasPos(bool b);
00139 
00140 
00141     bool HasQMPart() { return _hasQM; }
00153 protected:
00154     int         _id;
00155     string      _name;
00156 
00157     Topology   *_top;
00158     Molecule   *_mol;
00159     Segment    *_seg;
00160     Fragment   *_frag;    
00161 
00162     string      _type;
00163     int         _resnr;
00164     string      _resname;
00165     double      _weight;
00166     vec         _pos;
00167     bool        _bPos;
00168 
00169     bool        _hasQM;
00170     int         _qmId;
00171     vec         _qmPos;
00172     string      _element;
00173 
00174     // charge state of segment => partial charge
00175     map<int, double> _Q;    
00176     map<int, double> ::iterator _q;
00177     matrix _ptensor;
00178         
00179 };
00180 
00181 inline void Atom::setPos(const vec &r) {
00182     _bPos=true;
00183     _pos = r;
00184 }
00185 
00186 inline const vec &Atom::getPos() const {
00187     assert(_bPos);
00188     return _pos;
00189 }
00190 
00191 inline void Atom::HasPos(bool b) {
00192     _bPos=b;
00193 }
00194 
00195 inline void Atom::setQMPart(const int &qmid, vec qmPos) {
00196     if (qmid > -1) {
00197         _hasQM = true;
00198         _qmId = qmid;
00199         _qmPos = qmPos;
00200     }
00201     else {
00202         _hasQM = false;
00203         _qmId = -1;
00204     }
00205 }
00206 
00207 }}
